title: Chinese Nutrition by Food Group
sitename: Acupuncture.Com - Chinese Nutrition by Food Group

Qi| | Pork:|| neutral, sweet & salty, Sp, St, Ki, Lubricates dryness (Ni: sl. cold)|[top](#top) | Duck: || neutral, sweet & salty, Lu, Ki, Facilitates water passage, reduces, swellings| | Chicken: ||
